name: Antonia Apodaca
description: '''Antonia Apodaca''' (November 1, 1923 – January 25, 2020) was an American musician and songwriter known for her performances of traditional [[New Mexico music]]. She came to wider prominence through her performances in the ''La Música de los Viejitos'' festival in [[Santa Fe, New Mexico|Santa Fe]], the festival's nationally circulated radio broadcasts, and her appearances at the [[Smithsonian Folklife Festival]].
